name: ultralogi-rs
description: Rust game engine components for Ultralogi

scripts.build: DUCKDB_DOWNLOAD_LIB=1 napi build --release && cp target/release/deps/libduckdb.so . && patchelf --set-rpath '$ORIGIN' ultralogi-rs.node && node scripts/sync-exports.mjs
scripts.build:debug: DUCKDB_DOWNLOAD_LIB=1 napi build && cp target/debug/deps/libduckdb.so . && patchelf --set-rpath '$ORIGIN' ultralogi-rs.node && node scripts/sync-exports.mjs
